sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0a2e58db832a0210ae8dc4a6feaad3b1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_spotify_playlist</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_spotify_playlist">u_nameISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Playlist For Spotify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    try {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Spotify', 'Create New Playlist ');
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('user_id', '316ma7a2sq74is3szit3h4zsmpbm');
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', current.u_name);
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('description', current.u_description);

        var response = r.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
        responseBody = JSON.parse(responseBody);
        current.u_external_id = responseBody.id;
    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.message;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-07 15:37:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0a2e58db832a0210ae8dc4a6feaad3b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Playlist For Spotify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0a2e58db832a0210ae8dc4a6feaad3b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-07 15:44:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0a2e58db832a0210ae8dc4a6feaad3b1"/></record_update>
